name: R5-Device-R4-Device
title: Concept map to convert a FHIR R5 Device into FHIR R4

target.comment: R5 `Device` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Device`

element.display: An identifier that supports traceability to the event during which material in this product from one or more biological entities was obtained or pooled
Indicates a high-level grouping of the device

target.display: The capabilities supported on a  device, the standards to which the device conforms for a particular purpose, and used for the communication
target.comment: R5 `Device.conformsTo` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Device.specialization`

element.display: Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized
Specific form or variant of the standard

target.comment: R5 `Device.contact` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Device.contact`
R5 `Device.contained` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Device.contained`

element.display: The series of occurrences that repeats during the operation of the device
The reference to the definition for the device

target.display: The reference to the definition for the device
target.comment: R5 `Device.definition` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4 `Device.definition` - definition has change due to type change: R5 definition CodeableReference has no equivalent or mapped type in R4 definition

element.display: The name used to display by default when the device is referenced
A measurement of time during the device's operation (e.g., days, hours, mins, etc.)
Technical endpoints providing access to electronic services provided by the device
Date and time of expiry of this device (if applicable)

target.display: Date and time of expiry of this device (if applicable)
target.comment: R5 `Device.expirationDate` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Device.expirationDate`

R5 `Device.extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4 `Device.extension` - extension has change due to type change: R5 `extension` `Extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget for R4 `extension`

element.display: Linked device acting as a communication/data collector, translator or controller

target.comment: R5 `Device.id` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Device.id`
R5 `Device.identifier` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Device.identifier`

element.display: A set of rules under which this content was created

target.display: A set of rules under which this content was created
target.comment: R5 `Device.implicitRules` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Device.implicitRules`

R5 `Device.language` maps as SourceIsNarrowerThanTarget to R4 `Device.language` - language changed the binding strength from Required to Preferred; language has change due to type change: R5 `language` `code` maps as SourceIsNarrowerThanTarget for R4 `language`
R5 `Device.location` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Device.location`
R5 `Device.lotNumber` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Device.lotNumber`

element.display: Date when the device was made

target.display: Date when the device was made
target.comment: R5 `Device.manufactureDate` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Device.manufactureDate`
R5 `Device.manufacturer` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Device.manufacturer`
R5 `Device.meta` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Device.meta`

element.display: The designated condition for performing a task
The manufacturer's model number for the device

target.display: The model number for the device
target.comment: R5 `Device.modelNumber` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Device.modelNumber`

R5 `Device.modifierExtension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4 `Device.modifierExtension` - modifierExtension has change due to type change: R5 `modifierExtension` `Extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget for R4 `modifierExtension`

target.display: The name of the device as given by the manufacturer
target.comment: R5 `Device.name` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Device.deviceName`

element.display: Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized

target.display: udi-label-name | user-friendly-name | patient-reported-name | manufacturer-name | model-name | other
target.comment: R5 `Device.name.type` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Device.deviceName.type` - type has compatible required binding for code type: http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/device-nametype|5.0.0 and http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/device-nametype|4.0.1 (Equivalent)
R5 `Device.name.value` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Device.deviceName.name`
R5 `Device.note` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4 `Device.note` - note has change due to type change: R5 `note` `Annotation` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget for R4 `note`
R5 `Device.owner` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Device.owner`

element.display: The higher level or encompassing device that this device is a logical part of

target.comment: R5 `Device.parent` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Device.parent`

element.display: The part number or catalog number of the device

target.display: The part number of the device
target.comment: R5 `Device.partNumber` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Device.partNumber`

element.display: Inherent, essentially fixed, characteristics of the device.  e.g., time properties, size, material, etc.

target.display: The actual configuration settings of a device as it actually operates, e.g., regulation status, time properties
target.comment: R5 `Device.property` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Device.property`

R5 `Device.property.extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4 `Device.property.extension` - extension has change due to type change: R5 `extension` `Extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget for R4 `extension`
R5 `Device.property.id` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Device.property.id`

element.display: Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized

target.display: Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized
target.comment: R5 `Device.property.modifierExtension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4 `Device.property.modifierExtension` - modifierExtension has change due to type change: R5 `modifierExtension` `Extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget for R4 `modifierExtension`

element.display: Code that specifies the property being represented

target.display: Code that specifies the property DeviceDefinitionPropetyCode (Extensible)
target.comment: R5 `Device.property.type` maps as SourceIsNarrowerThanTarget to R4 `Device.property.type` - type removed a binding requirement - Example http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/device-property-type; type has change due to type change: R5 `type` `CodeableConcept` maps as SourceIsNarrowerThanTarget for R4 `type`

target.display: Property value as a code, e.g., NTP4 (synced to NTP)
target.comment: R5 `Device.property.value[x]` maps as RelatedTo to R4 `Device.property.valueCode` - valueCode changed from scalar to array (max cardinality from 1 to *); valueCode has change due to type change: R5 value[x] Quantity has no equivalent or mapped type in R4 valueCode; valueCode has change due to type change: R5 value[x] string has no equivalent or mapped type in R4 valueCode; valueCode has change due to type change: R5 value[x] boolean has no equivalent or mapped type in R4 valueCode; valueCode has change due to type change: R5 value[x] integer has no equivalent or mapped type in R4 valueCode; valueCode has change due to type change: R5 value[x] Range has no equivalent or mapped type in R4 valueCode; valueCode has change due to type change: R5 value[x] Attachment has no equivalent or mapped type in R4 valueCode

target.display: Property value as a code, e.g., NTP4 (synced to NTP)
target.comment: R5 `Device.property.value[x]` maps as RelatedTo to R4 `Device.property.valueCode` - valueCode changed from scalar to array (max cardinality from 1 to *); valueCode has change due to type change: R5 value[x] Quantity has no equivalent or mapped type in R4 valueCode; valueCode has change due to type change: R5 value[x] string has no equivalent or mapped type in R4 valueCode; valueCode has change due to type change: R5 value[x] boolean has no equivalent or mapped type in R4 valueCode; valueCode has change due to type change: R5 value[x] integer has no equivalent or mapped type in R4 valueCode; valueCode has change due to type change: R5 value[x] Range has no equivalent or mapped type in R4 valueCode; valueCode has change due to type change: R5 value[x] Attachment has no equivalent or mapped type in R4 valueCode

R5 `Device.property.value[x]` maps as RelatedTo to R4 `Device.property.valueQuantity` - valueQuantity changed from scalar to array (max cardinality from 1 to *); valueQuantity has change due to type change: R5 value[x] CodeableConcept has no equivalent or mapped type in R4 valueQuantity; valueQuantity has change due to type change: R5 value[x] string has no equivalent or mapped type in R4 valueQuantity; valueQuantity has change due to type change: R5 value[x] boolean has no equivalent or mapped type in R4 valueQuantity; valueQuantity has change due to type change: R5 value[x] integer has no equivalent or mapped type in R4 valueQuantity; valueQuantity has change due to type change: R5 value[x] Range has no equivalent or mapped type in R4 valueQuantity; valueQuantity has change due to type change: R5 value[x] Attachment has no equivalent or mapped type in R4 valueQuantity

R5 `Device.safety` maps as SourceIsNarrowerThanTarget to R4 `Device.safety` - safety removed a binding requirement - Example http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/device-safety; safety has change due to type change: R5 `safety` `CodeableConcept` maps as SourceIsNarrowerThanTarget for R4 `safety`

element.display: Serial number assigned by the manufacturer

target.display: Serial number assigned by the manufacturer
target.comment: R5 `Device.serialNumber` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Device.serialNumber`

R5 `Device.status` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Device.status` - status has compatible required binding for code type: http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/device-status|5.0.0 and http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/device-status|4.0.1 (Equivalent)

element.display: Text summary of the resource, for human interpretation

target.display: Text summary of the resource, for human interpretation
target.comment: R5 `Device.text` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Device.text`

element.display: The kind or type of device

target.display: The kind or type of device
target.comment: R5 `Device.type` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4 `Device.type` - type changed from array to scalar (max cardinality from * to 1)

R5 `Device.udiCarrier.carrierHRF` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Device.udiCarrier.carrierHRF`
R5 `Device.udiCarrier.deviceIdentifier` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Device.udiCarrier.deviceIdentifier`

element.display: barcode | rfid | manual | card | self-reported | electronic-transmission | unknown

target.comment: R5 `Device.udiCarrier.entryType` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Device.udiCarrier.entryType` - entryType has compatible required binding for code type: http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/udi-entry-type|5.0.0 and http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/udi-entry-type|4.0.1 (Equivalent)

R5 `Device.udiCarrier.extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4 `Device.udiCarrier.extension` - extension has change due to type change: R5 `extension` `Extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget for R4 `extension`
R5 `Device.udiCarrier.id` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Device.udiCarrier.id`
R5 `Device.udiCarrier.issuer` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Device.udiCarrier.issuer`
R5 `Device.udiCarrier.jurisdiction` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Device.udiCarrier.jurisdiction`

R5 `Device.url` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Device.url`
